thread.title: Building up?

author: news24.com
title: Building up?
text:
We demand; Freedom, free electricity & water, no tolls, education etc.
I wonder by myself how in 20 years no one has stepped up and said, "I want to build my own house, please help me to help myself. Then I will help the next guy to build his house, and we will then help the next guy..." We will learn the skill of building and we will help ourselves. We will contribute... Some other guy can help build cupboards, some other guy can look at techniques to take the water away. We want to learn - show us to help ourselves.
Has any freedomfighter/demander/criticiser said - "I have a good idea; lets have a festival where we showcase talent, traditional African talent and organize and showcase this for the people. I would love to see this. Why don't the masses have positive events which contribute talent, make a profit and in stead of dancing to break down sysems, have a dance and use the money to buy a hall and have more dances. Cater, feed people. Network. Learn from each other.
As a Capetonian I have no idea what a tribal dance is about and how it work - open a cultural centre in the different provinces and share the cultures of the land. I see a lot of good dancers on the television - employ them. This would benefit tourism and bring money into our country.
I want to ask why the Freedom fighters is breaking down everything that can benefit them and why are they not using the expertise available in our country, to build new innovative projects. Why do they not learn from the system they want to be Free from.
Stellenbosch University climbed 80 positions on the international accreditation system - contribute to this system, add value - why do you want to cause mayhem and dishounour it. Same in Durban, same in JHB.
The so called freedom fighters at Universities should know that if they attend classes and pass their exams, they will be able to contribute to the economy and in this way get economic freedom, without breaking down the system.
The point of this writing is to get people to understand that they can use the same actions and thinking in a positive way;
In stead of burning a bus, burn garbage. Then the area will be clean. Now you have a clean area and you can ride the bus when you are over your grievance
Instead of breaking down a system, reverse the system in your head and build a new one that works for you, or try apply that system to make sure your house does not flood in winter, that you can eat and that you have the possiblity of a job by learning a skill.
